questions.question: If a school bus with flashing red lights has stopped on the opposite side of a highway with two traffic lanes in each direction, you must:
choices: Only stop if the bus has stopped in a loading zone

questions.question: A road sign with a round shape means:
Which will help reduce the risk of neck injury in a collision?
When an emergency vehicle using flashing lights approaches you from behind, you must
choices: Drive to the right edge of the road and slow down
Pull to the right and stop
Proceed at normal speed but yield to the emergency vehicle

questions.question: At a four-way stop, a driver should always yield the right-of-way to:
choices: The vehicle that reaches the intersection first
The vehicle approaching from the left

questions.question: When making a left turn, you should:
choices: Signal at least 100 feet before the turn
Alert oncoming traffic by using your horn

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
choices: You should slow down to 35 mph or less before entering the curve
You should slow down to 35 mph or less after the curve

questions.question: At a social event alcohol is served and you must drive a short time after. Which is the best precaution to take?
choices: Eat a hot meal with your alcoholic drinks
Drink plenty of coffee before driving home

questions.question: Which is true about South Carolina point system and any reduction of points?
choices: Three points are removed each year
A defensive driving course removes all points
A defensive driving course removes four points

questions.question: When you see this sign, what should you expect ahead?
The driver ahead signals:
If your car starts to skid on a wet roadway, you can make the situation worse if you:
choices: Take your foot off the gas pedal
Steer in the direction you want to go

questions.question: Lanes marked on both sides by double-broken yellow lines are:
Why should you avoid passing or stopping close to a truck that is preparing to or is backing up?
choices: You might be in the driver's no-zone
Your motor is likely to stall
Trucks always have the right-of-way when backing up

questions.question: When driving in fog, you should:
You should not attempt to pass another vehicle:
choices: Within 100 feet of a fire hydrant

questions.question: This sign tells you that the center lane is used for:
If the dashed yellow line is on your side:
choices: Only traffic from the opposite direction may pass
You may pass other vehicles if safe
You are in a no-passing zone

questions.question: When driving at night and following another vehicle that is less than 200 feet in front of you, you must:
The amount of alcohol in the blood is often referred to as:
When you park on a hill headed uphill, and there is a curb, you should turn your front wheels:
choices: Toward the side of the road
Parallel to, and 6 to 12 inches away from the side of the road
Away from the side of the road

questions.question: When should you use your horn?
choices: When you want someone to drive faster
When a child is about to run into the street

questions.question: Wearing your safety belt:
choices: Reduces the chance of injury in a crash
Is not necessary, if you make frequent stops
Is not necessary, if you are pregnant

questions.question: When a traffic officer is directing you to drive against a red light, you should:
choices: Wait until somebody else follows the directions

questions.question: Signaling when suddenly slowing down or stopping is:
choices: Common courtesy, but not required by law
Required only in business districts, cities, and towns

questions.question: If your vehicle breaks down on a highway:
choices: Get your vehicle off the road
Have all passengers stay in the car

questions.question: When must you stop at a railroad crossing?
choices: When the crossing is marked with a crossbuck sign
When you transport children in a passenger vehicle
When a crossing gate is lowered

questions.question: You must yield the right-of-way to all pedestrians in an intersection:
choices: Even if the traffic light is green
Only if there is a marked crosswalk
Unless you are making a left turn

questions.question: A warning sign with these symbols has this shape:
What does this sign mean?
choices: Trucks might enter or cross the highway
A road crosses the main highway ahead
There will be fewer lanes ahead

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
This is an example of:
Alcohol generally:
choices: Makes you more aware of risks

questions.question: Signaling before turning is:
choices: Required by law in business districts, cities, and towns only
Common courtesy, but not required by law

questions.question: Which traffic light has the same meaning as a stop sign?
What is true about driving on a wet roadway?
choices: Water does not affect cars with good tires
As you drive faster, your tires become less effective

questions.question: Road signs with a four-sided diamond shape show:
In general, children under eight years of age must:
choices: Sit in the lap of an adult

questions.question: Which is more likely to affect your stopping distance?
If you are in a roundabout when an emergency vehicle with flashing lights approaches from behind, you should:
choices: Proceed through the roundabout and continue driving
Move to the right in the roundabout and stop
Proceed through the roundabout before stopping

questions.question: When driving at night in heavy traffic, you should use the following:
If you see a pedestrian with a white cane attempting to cross the street, you must:
choices: Pass slowly. The pedestrian will not cross until the sound of your car has disappeared
Honk your horn to warn the pedestrian
Stop and give the pedestrian the right of way at all times

questions.question: Passing another vehicle to the right on an unpaved shoulder is:
choices: Allowed if the other vehicle is going too slowly
Allowed if the other vehicle is turning left

questions.question: Which of the following vehicles must always stop before crossing railroad tracks?
Before entering another roadway, you see this sign. What does it mean?
choices: You must be prepared to merge

questions.question: The following are true about large trucks except:
choices: They accelerate slower than most cars
They have longer stopping distances than most cars
The driver of a truck can see the road better than the driver of a car

questions.question: At this intersection, cars in the center lane must:
If you encounter a flooded roadway, you should:
choices: Grip the steering wheel firmly and keep your speed
Turn around and seek an alternate route
Stop and immediately abandon your car

questions.question: If you are pulled over by a police officer, you should:
choices: Turn on your left turn signal
Move onto the center median and stop
Remain inside your car and keep hands in clear view

questions.question: When you approach a roundabout or traffic circle, you must:
choices: Drive as close to the right edge as possible

questions.question: Orange road signs give:
If your vehicle is equipped with airbags:
choices: Safety belts should be worn behind the back
You must also fasten your safety belt

questions.question: When driving at night, you should:
choices: Always keep your eyes focused straight ahead

questions.question: You have given consent to take a test for determining the alcoholic level in your blood:
choices: Only if you have been drinking alcohol
Only if you have been involved in an accident
Whenever you drive a motor vehicle in South Carolina

questions.question: How many points can be removed from your driving record by completing an approved defensive driving course?
If gates rise at a railroad crossing and the red lights still flash, you should:
choices: Stop and wait until the red lights stop flashing
Drive as quickly as possible across the crossing
Step outside the car to make sure no train is approaching

questions.question: When it is hard for you to see ahead because of darkness or bad weather, you need to:
choices: Lean forward and sit closer to the windshield
Drive in the lane closest to oncoming traffic
Fall back and increase your following distance

questions.question: When you plan to exit a multi-lane highway, you should:
choices: Plan ahead and give yourself plenty of time
Not use your turn signal until you exit
Start slowing down on the main highway
